instance_template: presentation(1..10). topic("AI"). topic("Cloud"). topic("IoT"). topic("VR"). day(1..4). slot(1..4). room(1..5).
generator: 1 { topicOf(P, T) : topic(T) } 1 :- presentation(P). 1 { scheduled(P, R, S, D) : room(R), slot(S), day(D) } 1 :- presentation(P).

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Ensure total policy compliance by allowing only one presentation per room-time pairing across the entire event schedule.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(P1, R, S, D), scheduled(P2, R, S, D), P1 < P2.

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Enforce room occupancy limits where no room exceeds three presentations on any single day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- room(R), day(D), #count { S : scheduled(_, R, S, D) } > 3.

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Maintain non-consecutive scheduling policy; rooms must not be assigned to back-to-back sessions within the same day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(_, R, S, D), scheduled(_, R, S+1, D).

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Restrict AI and Cloud presentations from Room 2 due to equipment limitations regarding projector availability.
hard_constraints.asp_rule:
:- scheduled(P, 2, S, D), topicOf(P, "AI").
:- scheduled(P, 2, S, D), topicOf(P, "Cloud").

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Enforce venue-specific restrictions prohibiting any Virtual Reality sessions from being held in Room 1.
Business Requirements: Compliance rule requiring IoT presentations to be distributed across a minimum of three distinct days to ensure topical separation.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- #count { D : topicOf(P, "IoT"), scheduled(P, R, S, D) } < 3.

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Spatial separation policy forbids AI and VR presentations from sharing the same physical room on the same day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- topicOf(P1, "AI"), scheduled(P1, R, S1, D), topicOf(P2, "VR"), scheduled(P2, R, S2, D).

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Regulate simultaneous activity by capping the overlap of Cloud and IoT sessions to a maximum of two per time slot across all rooms.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- day(D), slot(S), #count { P : topicOf(P, "Cloud"), scheduled(P, R, S, D) ; P : topicOf(P, "IoT"), scheduled(P, R, S, D) } > 2.

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: The early morning session on Day 1 is strictly reserved for AI presentations; no other subject matter is permitted.
hard_constraints.asp_rule:
:- not scheduled(_, _, 1, 1).
:- scheduled(P, R, 1, 1), not topicOf(P, "AI").

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: The early afternoon session on Day 4 is exclusively designated for VR presentations; all other topics are prohibited in this slot.
hard_constraints.asp_rule:
:- not scheduled(_, _, 3, 4).
:- scheduled(P, R, 3, 4), not topicOf(P, "VR").

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Ensure consistent daily event activity by requiring at least one presentation to be scheduled on every day of the event.
Business Requirements: Promote topic diversity by requiring that every utilized time slot features at least two distinct subject areas.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- day(D), slot(S), scheduled(_, _, S, D), #count { T : topicOf(P, T), scheduled(P, R, S, D) } < 2.

soft_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Optimize room utilization by maximizing the number of physical spaces occupied during every session.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("UnusedRoomsInSession", (S, D), 5 - N) :- slot(S), day(D), N = #count { R : scheduled(_, R, S, D) }.

soft_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Minimize overall resource inefficiency by reducing the total number of idle room-time slots across the event.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("IdleSlot", (R, S, D), 1) :- room(R), slot(S), day(D), not scheduled(_, R, S, D).

global_objective: #minimize { C@2,S,D : penalty("UnusedRoomsInSession", (S, D), C); C@1,R,S,D : penalty("IdleSlot", (R, S, D), C) }.
